welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Anoka! Known as the 'Halloween Capital of the World', this charming city is full of history, culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Anoka has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Crystal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.
